introduction.welcome: Welcome to the Shared drive mover, a tool for moving batches of files and folders across Google Drive. The tool is particularly useful for moving from "My Drive" to a Shared drive (formerly known as a Team drive). In the following steps, you will select a source folder and a destination folder. The contents of the selected source folder will then be moved to the destination folder. This process can take some time, so please be patient.

copyComments.title: Copy comments when copying files
copyComments.description: When moving files of which you are not the owner, instead of moving the file, a copy without comments is created in the destination folder. If this option is checked, the comments will be recreated from your account, with the original commenter tagged. Note that this may slow down the moving of such files.

mergeFolders.title: Merge folders with matching names
mergeFolders.description: If a folder from the source already exists in the destination, they will be merged together. Works for subfolders as well.

source-selection.introduction: Please select the folder to move files from.

destination-selection.introduction: Please select the folder to move files to.

confirmation.introduction: Are you sure you want to move the contents of the folder "{source}" into the folder "{destination}"?

moving.introduction: Shared drive mover is moving your files. Please do not close this browser tab.

nonEmptyDialog.title: Destination not empty
nonEmptyDialog.content: The selected destination is not empty. Do you want to proceed anyway?

done.introduction: Successfully moved. You can delete the original files from your Google Drive - some of them may have been left behind as they cannot be removed automatically.

errors.introduction: While moving the files, some errors were encountered and the following files couldn't be moved. Please move these files manually and report these failures in {link} if you think they are caused by bugs in this tool.

errorDialog.title: An error occurred
errorDialog.DriveAPIError: An error occurred in Google Drive. Please check the source and destination folders and try again.
errorDialog.sourceEqualsDestination: The source and destination folders must be different
errorDialog.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please check the source and destination folders and try again.
errorDialog.unknownErrorWithMessage: An unknown error occurred. Please check the source and destination folders and try again. Error message:
